mapper.select:
SELECT kct.class_timetable_id,kc.class_id from k_class kc join k_class_time kct on kc.class_id = kct.class_id
WHERE kc.class_id = #{classId};

SELECT kct.class_timetable_id, kcm.class_id from k_class_member kcm join k_class_time kct on kct.class_id = kcm.class_id
where kcm.stu_id =#{userId};
